title: Software Engineer
aboutDescription: I am a student who is about to transition into a career as a software engineer. I am preparing to take on challenging tasks and seek opportunities to develop my skills both in my current role and in new areas. I take pride in my strong work ethic, which is reflected in my commitment to producing high-quality work. I am a calm problem-solver by nature and believe that the best solutions arise through collaboration and open communication.

experienceBoxes.title: Full-Stack Developer
experienceBoxes.text: I work independently on websites and web applications. I am responsible for both front-end and back-end development, and I handle project planning, technical implementation, and client collaboration.

experienceBoxes.title: Processing Operator
experienceBoxes.text: I was responsible for inspecting and repairing electronic components. Workdays lasted 12 hours and I needed to stay alert and focused to ensure that the final products were flawless and of high quality.

experienceBoxes.title: Assistant ( PCR )
experienceBoxes.text: As a COVID-19 testing assistant, I conducted daily tests for 100-200 people. My work involved handling samples and preparing them for further processing, as well as assisting nurses in conducting COVID-19 tests.

experienceBoxes.title: Receptionist
experienceBoxes.text: I assisted approximately 200-400 people daily in performing COVID-19 vaccinations. My duties included assisting customers, ensuring their well-being and making sure they felt comfortable.

experienceBoxes.title: Warehouse Worker
experienceBoxes.text: My duties included picking frozen goods according to customer orders, ensuring accuracy and timely delivery. I also maintained order in the department and in the warehouse.

experienceBoxes.title: Mailing and Enveloping
experienceBoxes.text: My duties included sorting letters and packages, opening envelopes, sealing them, and preparing mail for dispatch.

projectsCards.name: MenStyle
projectsCards.description:
**ONGOING PROJECT...** 
 
Men Style is a **website** for a barber shop chain in Finland with 9 locations across the country.
 
Build with **React**, **Next.js**, **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, **Express**, and **CSS**.

projectsCards.name: EcoPlug
projectsCards.description:
Ecoplug is a **mobile app** that helps users find available electric vehicle charging spots in Uusimaa. 
 
 Built with **React Native**, **Javascript**, **CSS**, **Node.js** and **MySQL**. 
 
 **Docker** and **Jenkins** is used for continuous integration and testing.

projectsCards.name: Tuutorikeskus
projectsCards.description:
Tuutorikeskus is a **website** that provides guidance and support to help students prepare for their medical entrance exams in Romania.
 
 Built with **React**, **Javascript**, **Node.js**, **Express** and **CSS**. 
 
Created as a mobile and desktop version.

projectsCards.name: Sähkö Dominus
projectsCards.description:
Sähkö Dominus is a **website** made for a client offering professional electronic installation and repair services.
 
 Build with **React**, **Javascript**, **Node.js**, **Express** and **CSS**. 
 
Created as a mobile and desktop version.
